text: They supply the worst workers for holland Bukit Panjang town council. Wanted to threaten me to fight and illegally selling metal scrap. Let everyone see and judge for yourselves

8:30 am 26/04/2025 at Kallang Wet Market, my son 2Y vomit due to cough, I know this is worse situation for staffs, I try to put some tissue to get the things dry, however CTM cleaner ( an old lady) instructed my helper to clean up vomit. I stop my helper to see what they would do, staff then show attitude that she not happy with this. She didnâ€™t know the simple way to clean up spillage and want to use broom and dust pan to clear. I stopped her and helped her to clean then I place caution signed for temporary while  waiting for staffs to mop the floor. However no one could bother it until the floor get dry. This is terrible experience.

Absolutely the worst of all the cleaning contractors engaged by NEA over the last 10 years! The cleaning schedule states 3 times a week. They turn up about once a fortnight, and usually only when a resident complains. They say they do not have the manpower to fulfil the conditions stated by NEA. So why are we wasting public money for non-existent services?
Worst cleaner on the road in River Valley! People were walking, and suddenly the cleaner drove right there, sending all the dust our way. So annoying for pedestrians!

Feel cheated when doing ot.ot 3hrs but cut 0.5hrs and the reason is the breaktime not included in ot.but as a floater we dont actually have break time in those 3hrs of ot cause we constantly on standby and have alot to do in those 3hrs of ot.
